column4: hi everyone, 2 questions, what is the path to the default ubuntu wallpaper, cause i used to use xchat on transparent background when i used ubuntu default background and now i have a blackish wallpaper and cant read the xchat window?   And question 2, cedega is not free, and has a subscrition, but, if i pay 1 month i can use it forever just without updates or is the subscription for monthly use ?
you won't get updates and support but you have to pay for 3 months
yea I have cedega on a cd for slackware that I use
